name: September 2013 FlashBack Studio Sale - 8
description:
Artist: Aisha Cousins
Medium: Ink on tinted archival paper
Dimensions: 4" x 6"
Year: 2002

Each month, aishacousins.com presents a curated selection of original works from the artist's vaults. For September, we present this series of 8 untitled line drawings completed in 2002. They feature lush layered backdrops, stark figure compositions inspired by Barkley Hendricks' portraits of black life in the 1970's, and a peek into a series of rarely seen experimental "subplot drawings" -inspired by Shakespeare's literary usage of subplots- in which Cousins pairs detailed facial drawings with contrasting groups of small, full figure stickmen to illustrate the inner workings of her characters' minds.

name: 2 yards of Obama Fabric from Ghana
description:
The last of a special batch printed to commemorate President Obama's historic inauguration. 

Printed in Akosombo, Ghana in 2008.

100% cotton. 
Hand wash or dry clean.

We have tested a number of the African Obama fabrics available in the USA. This one has proven, hands down, to be the most durable and color fast in this price range.

Fabric ships in 3-5 business days via priority mail.

(Images show 2 yards of fabric and a closeup of the Obama portrait)
